name: Scattered Power
description:
Title: Scattered Power

Platform: PC

Genre: Action / Platformer

Rating; E

Target Market: 7+, Casual Gamers

Overview: Play through this brief platformer as a Minifigure collecting his scattered power in the form of crystals. You must return the crystals to the temple at the pinnacle where you can put them back together.

Controls: WASD to move and space to jump or double jump (when in the air). Use the mouse to control the camera and tab to pause the game where you can change the camera sensitivity (I suggest turning it down a little).
